entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Harry'.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard, mentioned as 'Dumbledore'. He is waving his wand to make things disappear.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: An object that makes the wearer invisible. Harry extracts it from his trunk.

entities.name: trunk
entities.description: A container where Harry keeps his belongings. It is mentioned as being messy.

entities.name: cage
entities.description: An object that holds Hedwig, a bird. It disappears with the trunk.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: A bird that is being held in a cage. It disappears with the trunk.

entities.name: front door
entities.description: The entrance to a building. It opens onto cool, misty darkness.

relationships.description: Harry extracts the Invisibility Cloak from his trunk.
Dumbledore waves his wand and the trunk disappears.
Dumbledore waves his wand again, and the cage disappears with the trunk.
Hedwig disappears with the trunk when Dumbledore waves his wand.
Dumbledore waves his wand and the front door opens onto cool, misty darkness.
